text: Carlos Ant√¥nio Dobbert de Carvalho Leite (June 25, 1912 - July 19, 2004), best known as Carvalho Leite is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Carioca (5): :Botafogo: 1930, 1932, 1933, 1934, 1935 ===Individual=== * Campeonato Carioca topscorer (5): :Botafogo: 1931 (13 goals), 1935 (16 goals), 1936 (15 goals), 1938 (16 goals), 1939 (22 goals) ==References== Category:1912 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Brazilian football managers Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
